### Transfer Technology
### Automatically generated by Yard1's transfer_technology generator, for Equestria at War
### PREV is the giver, THIS is the reciever
transfer_technology = {
	hidden_effect = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = force_rotation
					has_tech = formation_flying
					is_researching_technology = force_rotation
					is_researching_technology = formation_flying
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = air_superiority
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					air_superiority = 1
				}
			}

				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				early_bomber = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = interwar_artillery
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				interwar_artillery = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = artillery1

			}

			}
		}

			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_deer_race = yes
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_deer_army3
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_deer_army3 = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_deer_race = yes
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_deer_army_atk
					is_researching_technology = tech_deer_army_atk
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_deer_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_deer_army_def
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_deer_army_def = 1
				}
			}

				limit = {
					is_deer_race = yes
					PREV = {

					}
				}

					tech_deer_army_def2 = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_deer_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_deer_army_def3
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_deer_army_def3 = 1
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_deer_race = yes
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_deer_army_def
					is_researching_technology = tech_deer_army_def
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_deer_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_deer_army_atk
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_deer_army_atk = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_deer_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_deer_army_atk2
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_deer_army_atk2 = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_deer_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_deer_army_atk3
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_deer_army_atk3 = 1
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = { is_griffon_race = yes }
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_knights
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_knights = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_knights2
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_knights2 = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = tech_knights_regular
						is_researching_technology = tech_knights_regular
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_knights_magical
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_knights_magical = 1
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_knights_magical2
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_knights_magical2 = 1
					}
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = tech_knights_magical
						is_researching_technology = tech_knights_magical
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = tech_knights_regular
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_knights_regular = 1
					}
				}

					limit = {
						PREV = {

						}
					}

					}
				}

				limit = {

				}

			}

				tech_generic_r4 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_generic_r5
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_generic_r5 = 1
			}
		}

		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = advanced_infantry_weapons_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				advanced_infantry_weapons_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = advanced_infantry_weapons_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				advanced_infantry_weapons_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = advanced_infantry_weapons_d
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				advanced_infantry_weapons_d = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = advanced_infantry_weapons_e
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				advanced_infantry_weapons_e = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = infantry_at_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				infantry_at_a = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {

			}

			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = support_weapons_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				support_weapons_c = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = superior_firepower
					has_tech = trench_warfare
					has_tech = mass_assault
					is_researching_technology = superior_firepower
					is_researching_technology = trench_warfare
					is_researching_technology = mass_assault
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = mobile_warfare
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						bonus = 0.75
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							mobile_warfare = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = delay
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF
					}
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = land_doc_bonus
						bonus = 0.75
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							delay = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = elastic_defence
					}

					limit = {
						PREV = { is_ai = yes } original_tag = GRF

						name = land_doc_bonus
						bonus = 0.75
						uses = 1
						category = land_doctrine
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							elastic_defence = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_tech = armored_spearhead
						is_researching_technology = armored_spearhead
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = mobile_infantry
						}

					}

			limit = {
				NOT = {

					is_researching_technology = superior_firepower
					is_researching_technology = mass_assault

				limit = {
					PREV = {
						has_tech = trench_warfare
					}

					limit = {
						PREV = {

							PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
								original_tag = NLR
								original_tag = OLE
							}

							name = land_doc_bonus

							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine

								assault_breakthrough = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = central_planning
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
								original_tag = NLR
								original_tag = OLE
							}
						}
						add_tech_bonus = {
							name = land_doc_bonus
							bonus = 0.75
							uses = 1
							category = land_doctrine
						}
						else = {
							set_technology = {
								central_planning = 1
							}
						}
					}
				}

				if = {
					limit = {
						PREV = {
							has_tech = c3i_theory
						}
					}
					if = {

			limit = {
				NOT = {

					is_researching_technology = base_strike
				}
			}
		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = trade_interdiction
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
						original_tag = NLR
						original_tag = OLE
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = naval_doc_bonus
					bonus = 0.75
					uses = 1
					category = naval_doctrine
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						trade_interdiction = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = convoy_interdiction_ti
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
						original_tag = NLR
						original_tag = OLE
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = naval_doc_bonus
					bonus = 0.75
					uses = 1
					category = naval_doctrine
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						convoy_interdiction_ti = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = unrestricted_submarine_warfare
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
						original_tag = NLR
						original_tag = OLE
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = naval_doc_bonus
					bonus = 0.75
					uses = 1
					category = naval_doctrine
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						unrestricted_submarine_warfare = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = wolfpacks
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {

			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = battlefleet_concentration_ti
				}

			if = {

				else = {

		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = floating_fortress_ti
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {

					has_tech = subsidiary_carrier_role_ti
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {

						original_tag = NLR

				else = {

			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = naval_air_operations
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
						original_tag = NLR
						original_tag = OLE
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = naval_doc_bonus
					bonus = 0.75
					uses = 1
					category = naval_doctrine
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						naval_air_operations = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_tech = trade_interdiction
					has_tech = fleet_in_being
					is_researching_technology = trade_interdiction
					is_researching_technology = fleet_in_being
				}
			}
		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = base_strike
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
						original_tag = NMS
						original_tag = BAL
						original_tag = GFF
						original_tag = JUN
					}
				}
				add_tech_bonus = {
					name = naval_doc_bonus
					bonus = 0.75
					uses = 1
					category = naval_doctrine
				}
				else = {
					set_technology = {
						base_strike = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = carrier_primacy
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					PREV = { is_ai = yes } OR = {
						original_tag = NMS

				}

						original_tag = JUN

				}

		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = early_destroyer
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				early_destroyer = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = basic_destroyer
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				basic_destroyer = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = improved_destroyer
				}
			}
			set_technology = {

			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = advanced_destroyer
				}
			}

			}
		}

			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = early_light_cruiser
				}
			}

			}
		}

				PREV = {

				}
			}

			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = improved_light_cruiser
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				improved_light_cruiser = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = advanced_light_cruiser
				}
			}

				advanced_light_cruiser = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = early_heavy_cruiser
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				early_heavy_cruiser = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = basic_heavy_cruiser
				}
			}

			}
		}

			limit = {
				PREV = {

				}

			}
		}

				}

			}
		}

			limit = {
				PREV = {

				}
			}

			}
		}

			limit = {
				PREV = {

				}

				}

				}
			}

			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = heavy_battleship2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				heavy_battleship2 = 1
			}

			limit = {

			}

				transport = 1

			}

			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes

					has_tech = tech_pony_misc3
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pony_misc3 = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes

				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pony_misc_a = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes

					has_tech = tech_pony_misc_a2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pony_misc_a2 = 1
			}
		}

				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pony_misc_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_pony_misc_c
				}
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_pony_misc_c2
					is_researching_technology = tech_pony_misc_c2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pony_misc_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_pony_misc_c2
				}
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_pony_misc_c
					is_researching_technology = tech_pony_misc_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pony_misc_c2 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_pegasi
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pegasi = 1
			}
		}

			limit = {

				}
			}
			set_technology = {

			}

			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes

				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_pegasi_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_unicorn
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_unicorn = 1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_unicorn_ms
					is_researching_technology = tech_unicorn_ms
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_th
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = NMS
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_unicorn_ms = 1
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							tech_unicorn_th = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_th2
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = NMS
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_unicorn_ms2 = 1
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							tech_unicorn_th2 = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_th3
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = NMS
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_unicorn_ms3 = 1
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							tech_unicorn_th3 = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_th4
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = NMS
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_unicorn_ms4 = 1
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							tech_unicorn_th4 = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_th5
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						OR = {
							original_tag = NLR
							original_tag = NMS
						}
					}
					set_technology = {
						tech_unicorn_ms5 = 1
					}
					else = {
						set_technology = {
							tech_unicorn_th5 = 1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_unicorn_th
					is_researching_technology = tech_unicorn_th
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_ms
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_unicorn_ms = 1
				}
			}

			if = {
				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_ms2
					}
				}
				set_technology = {

				}
			}

				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {

					}

					tech_unicorn_ms4 = 1

			}

				limit = {
					is_pony_race = yes
					PREV = {
						has_tech = tech_unicorn_ms5
					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_unicorn_ms5 = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_pony_unicorns
					is_researching_technology = tech_pony_unicorns
				}
			}

				}
			}

				limit = {

					}
				}
				set_technology = {
					tech_pony_magical_infantry5 = 1
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				is_pony_race = yes
				NOT = {
					has_tech = tech_pony_magical_infantry
					is_researching_technology = tech_pony_magical_infantry
				}
			}

			}

			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_military_police3
				}

				tech_military_police3 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_military_police4
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_military_police4 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company2 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company3
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company3 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company4
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company4 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital2 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital3
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital3 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital4
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital4 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company2 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company3
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company3 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company4
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company4 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company2
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company2 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company3
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company3 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company4
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company4 = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_signal_company_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_signal_company_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_engineers_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_engineers_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_engineers_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_engineers_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_engineers_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_engineers_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_recon_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_recon_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_recon_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_recon_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_recon_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_recon_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_military_police_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_military_police_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_military_police_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_military_police_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_military_police_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_military_police_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_maintenance_company_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_maintenance_company_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_field_hospital_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_field_hospital_c = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company_a
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company_a = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company_b
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company_b = 1
			}
		}

		if = {
			limit = {
				PREV = {
					has_tech = tech_logistics_company_c
				}
			}
			set_technology = {
				tech_logistics_company_c = 1
			}
		}
	}
}
